snippet.title: Little Ghost Project - spooky point and click (trailer)
snippet.description:
A trailer for Little Ghost Project, an upcoming spooky 3D point and click adventure currently crowdfunding on Ulule: https://www.ulule.com/little-ghost/ that will support #Linux

Follow us: https://twitter.com/gamingonlinux
Read some news: https://www.gamingonlinux.com/
